definition: three, set five remove two (abacus rule)/efficiently/quickly and easily
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Acting quickly, she soon removed the stain from the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她三下五除二，很快就把地板上的斑点给搞掉了。

definition: (idiom) with everyone lending a hand (eagerly but somewhat chaotically)
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
to pick up (from the ground with one's hands)
see 二話不說|二话不说[er4 hua4 bu4 shuo1]
like a hungry tiger pouncing on its prey
see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]
with a crash/with a thunderous noise
